nodes.text: Erriya was a male Wookiee who was a former member of the Myyydril tribe and resident of the Myyydril Caverns within the Kkowir Forest on his homeworld of Kashyyyk during the Galactic Civil War in 1 ABY. His entire left arm was cybernetic as the result of experiments performed on him by Dr. Nycolai Kinesworthy.
Erriya appears in the 2005 expansion pack to Star Wars Galaxies entitled Rage of the Wookiees prior to the games closure on December 15, 2011.
